an5.286:1.1: “Mendicants, a monk with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.286:1.3: He kills living creatures, steals, has sex, lies, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
an5.286:1.4: A monk with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.286:2.1: A monk with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.286:2.3: He doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, have sex, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
an5.286:2.4: A monk with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
